text: CERTIFIED NURSE ASSISTANT Professional Summary I am a motivated individual with highly effective communication skills as well as a level-headed health professional who remains calm and effective in extremely difficult and stressful situations.
I am seeking a job in the Medical field in a Clinical position that will enable me to grow as a knowledgeable professional and enhance my current abilities.
